item.title: Clock Tower Quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::::::::::::Clock Tower Quest::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

VIDEO:

Part 1:

Part 2:

NPC IDS for quest:
ID: 366 Brother Kojo
ID: 367 Dungeon Rat
ID: 525 Ogres

ITEM IDS for quest:
ID: 727 Large cog
ID: 728 Large cog
ID: 729 Large cog
ID: 730 Large cog
ID: 731 Rat Poison
ID: 21 Bucket
ID: 556 Ice gloves

Object IDS for quest:
ID: 374 push lever
ID: 373 pull lever
ID: 111 rat cage
ID: 375 foodtrough
ID: 227 ladder
ID: 22 Odd looking wall —coords:584,y:3457
ID: 362 clock pole blue
ID: 363 clock pole red
ID: 364 clock pole purple
ID: 365 clock pole black

Missing objects:
ID: 48 sink needs implemented: spawn in clock tower

Missing information:
1)If you use cog on pole and its the wrong one, what is the message.
2)Using ice gloves to pick up cog message.
3)Going back to Brother Kojo after you have 1 or more cogs already on, but not completed yet

Quest notes:

  1. Spawn brother Kojo at coords: X:582 , Y:633
  2. Spawn level 13 goblins at coords X:579 ,Y:3484 ID:? (about 3 of em)
  3. Spawn rat poison at coords: X:592 , Y: 3483
  4. Spawn iron chain at coords: X:589, Y:3481
  5. Spawn purple cog at coords: X:579,Y:3474
  6. Search cage after lever completion of posioned rats (stage 3) teleports u to coords X:582, 3476. Can only go in 1 way…
  7. Can only carry 1 cog at a time, or else too heavy:

sendmessage("The cogs are heavy"); sendmessage("You can only carry one");
8) missing object: spawn sink at coords: x:579,Y:640
9)spawn small bones at coords: A)x:594, y:3468 B)x:595,y:3471 C)x:598,y:3472, D)x:606,y:3484 E)x:614,y:3483
10)spawn 3 orges at coords: x:609, y:3483
11)spawn knife at coords: x:612,y:3482
12)spawn coins at coords: x:617,y:3483
13)spawn red cog at coords: x:616,y:3484
14)You go up ladder at coords x:580 ,y:3474 you get teleported to coords: x:580, y:642
15)spawn black cog at coords: x:609,y:3465,
if you try to pick up black cog without ice gloves or bucket of water then:

16)Odd looking wall teleports to coords: x:583,y:3457
17)spawn blue cog at coords: x:583,y:3456

part 1

Talk to Brother Kojo:
[code]public void run() {
playerTalk(“Hello monk”);
npcTalk(“Hello traveller, I’m Brother Kojo”);
npcTalk(“Do you know the time?”);
playerTalk(“No… Sorry”);
npcTalk(“Oh dear, oh dear, I must fix the clock”);
npcTalk(“The town people are becoming angry”);
npcTalk(“Please could you help?”);
int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Ok old monk what can I

do?", “Not now old monk”});
if(choice == 0) {
okmonk();
} else if(choice == 1) {
nomonk();
}
}
private void okmonk() {
npcTalk(“Oh thank you kind sir”);
npcTalk(“In the cellar below you’ll find four cogs”);
npcTalk(“They’re too heavy for me, but you should”);
npcTalk(“Be able to carry them one at a time”);
npcTalk(“One goes on each floor”);
npcTalk(“But I can’t remember which goes where”);
playerTalk(“I’ll do my best”);
npcTalk(“Be careful, strange beasts dwell in the cellars”);
}
}
private void nomonk() {
npcTalk(“Ok then”);
}
}[/code]

****part2 ****

Retalking to Brother Kojo after first conversation, accepting his task (stage 2)

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("Hello again");
	npcTalk("Oh hello, are you having trouble?");
	npcTalk("The cogs are in four rooms below us");
	npcTalk("Place one cog on a pole on each");
	npcTalk("Of the four tower levels");
	}
}[/code]

Part 3
(stage 1 of food poison)
Using Rat poison on Foodthrough:

part 4
(Stage 2 of food poison)
Activating levers:

-The Pull lever shuts front gate:

-The push lever: activates poison
public void run() { sendmessage("In their panic the rats bend and twist"); sendmessage("The cage bars with their teeth"); sendmessage("They're becoming weak, some have collapsed"); sendmessage("The rats are eating poison"); sendmessage("They're becoming weak, some have collapsed"); sendmessage("The rats are slowly dying"); } }
-----------------Rats disappear(all of them) --------------------

part 5
(stage 3 of food posion)

Search rat cage (small gated area next to rat cage) X:583, Y:3476, "only after you

have completed the quest stage of levers:"

	[code]public void run() {
	sendmessage("In a panic to escape, the rats have..");
	sendmessage("..bent the bars, you can just crawl through");
	}
}[/code]

part 6

When any cog place on right type of pole then:

Pole inspection If no cog on pole:

inspect: clock pole black (option)

inspect: clock pole purple (option)

inspect: clock pole blue (option)

inspect: clock pole red (option)

Cog placement Order:

::::::::::Purple Cog: 3rd floor Tower:::::::::::::::::::
inspect: clock pole purple (option) after you put it on:

:::::::::Red Cog: 2nd floor Tower:::::::::::::::::::
inspect: clock pole red (option) after you put it on:

:::::::::Blue Cog: basement Tower:::::::::::::::::::
inspect: clock pole blue (option) after you put it on:

::::::::Black Cog: 1st floor level Tower:::::::::
inspect: clock pole black (option) after you put it on:

PArt7

Talking to brother Kojo after all cogs have been placed on poles:

[code]public void run() {
playerTalk("I have replaced all the cogs");
npcTalk("Really..? wait, listen");
sendmessage("Tick Tock, Tick Tock");
npcTalk("Well done, well done");
sendmessage("Tick Tock, Tick Tock");
npcTalk("Yes yes yes, you've done it");
npcTalk("You are clever");
sendmessage("You have completed the clock tower quest");
npcTalk("That will please the village folk");
npcTalk("Please take these coins as a reward");
sendmessage("You have gained 1 quest point!");
----------reward is 500 gp------------------[/code]

Read full topic
